subject: Education (K-12)
Juvenile Delinquency
Basketball
Series
lead_paragraph: For a 17-year-old senior now at Carroll Academy, a school for troubled teenagers in Huntingdon, Tenn., dreams of college gave way to fights, drug use and pregnancy.
